attributes.action: make it a criminal offence for a person, or persons, to wait at traffic junctions and clean windscreens of stationary cars.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These persons are a hazard to road users. They intimidate lone drivers, interrupt the flow of traffic eg. causing people to stop short at junctions or cause delays to cars waiting to move off and effectively demand monies with menace whilst generating an undeclared income.
